word_mean: 血小板：见于所有哺乳动物血液中的一种盘状结构，直径2～4μm，其作用与血液凝固有关

sentence.Network_cn: 这是减少血小板的隔离与破坏这么简单的一个问题.

sentence.Network_en: The splenectomy also removes a suppressant of bone marrow platelet production or release.
sentence.Network_cn: 脾切除术还消除了抑制骨髓生产或释放血小板的作用.

entry.def: Platelets are a kind of blood cell. If you cut yourself and you are bleeding, platelets help to stop the bleeding.

means.word_mean: 1. tiny bits of protoplasm found in vertebrate blood; essential for blood clotting
